In India there is an enormous gap between healthcare supply and demand. What do you think are the major steps that can be taken by the government to improve patient care in the country?

My view about India Health care is very low because of not having proper facitilies and funds. There is so much of demand but supply is very less, because of this India is having a major problem in Health care. The Government should take certain actions regarding this issues. It should pass a bill in assembly about the health care management system.

One of the major problem is not having proper equipments for major operations.The government should take responsibility to import those equipments from other countries like US,JAPAN etc. The second problem is about Research and Development. The government should provide funds in Research and Development.Third problem is about not having proper teaching staff and labs in Medical schools and colleges.The government should provide some funds so that there can hire and train the people.

Which I mentioned above if government could improves those area there will be no gap between healthcare supply and demand in India.

Thank you for giving this question,where i gave my opinion about health care system in India.
